sn26.8:4.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, rūpataṇhāya uppādo ṭhiti … pe …
sn26.8:4.4: yo dhammataṇhāya uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn26.8:4.5: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpataṇhāya nirodho … pe …
sn26.8:4.7: yo dhammataṇhāya nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
